item.title: I wrote my first bash script
item.author: mihir@learningwala.in (Mihir Pathak)
item.description: «««< HEAD A Bash script is a file containing a series of commands that are executed by the Bash shell (Bourne Again SHell). It allows for the automation of repetitive tasks, configuration, and management of systems. it is super interesting to write and test A Bash script is a file containing a series of commands that are executed by the Bash shell (Bourne Again SHell). It allows for the automation of repetitive tasks, configuration, and management of systems.
item.content:encoded:
«««< HEAD A Bash script is a file containing a series of commands that are executed by the Bash shell (Bourne Again SHell). It allows for the automation of repetitive tasks, configuration, and management of systems. it is super interesting to write and test

A Bash script is a file containing a series of commands that are executed by the Bash shell (Bourne Again SHell). It allows for the automation of repetitive tasks, configuration, and management of systems.
